mapper.sql: wis.stocktaking_id, wis.stocktaking_code, wis.contract_code, wis.pallet_code, wis.pro_line_id, wis.material_id, wis.book_inventory, wis.counted_quantity, wis.profit_loss_quantity, wis.delivery_rate, wis.price, wis.profit_loss_amount, wis.stockist_id, wis.create_user_id, wis.`status`, wis.organization_id, wis.remark, wis.create_time, wis.modified_user_id, wis.modified_time, wis.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, spl.pro_code, spl.pro_name, spl.pro_desc, spl.work_shop_id, swh.work_shop_code, swh.work_shop_name, swh.work_shop_desc, suss.user_name AS stockist_name, suss.user_code AS stockist_code, sm.material_code, sm.material_name, sm.material_desc, bo.organization_name, ss.storage_name,ss.storage_code,sw.warehouse_code,sw.warehouse_name,swa.warehouse_area_name,swa.warehouse_area_code from fantech_imes.wms_inner_stocktaking wis LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON wis.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON wis.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user suss ON wis.stockist_id = suss.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_pro_line spl ON wis.pro_line_id = spl.pro_line_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_work_shop swh ON spl.work_shop_id = swh.work_shop_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_material sm ON wis.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_storage_material ssm ON sm.material_id = ssm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_storage ss ON ss.storage_id = ssm.storage_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_warehouse sw ON sw.warehouse_id = ssm.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_warehouse_area swa ON swa.warehouse_area_id = ssm.warehouse_area_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON wis.organization_id = bo.organization_id
and date_format(wis.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and wis.stocktaking_code like CONCAT('%', #{stocktakingCode}, '%')
and spl.pro_code like CONCAT('%', #{proCode}, '%')
and spl.pro_name like CONCAT('%', #{proName}, '%')
and swh.work_shop_code like CONCAT('%', #{workShopCode}, '%')
and swh.work_shop_code like CONCAT('%', #{workShopCode}, '%')
and swh.work_shop_code like CONCAT('%', #{workShopCode}, '%')
and swh.work_shop_name like CONCAT('%', #{workShopName}, '%')
and sm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and wis.status=#{status}
order by wis.create_time desc
